api_list.name: Get Product
api_list.description: Get Product by ASIN with ability specify response
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-products5.p.rapidapi.com/products/item"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-products5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Product Items By ASIN
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-products5.p.rapidapi.com/products/items"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-products5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
